VERY NEAT AND STYLISH HAVAL H6 SUPER LUXURY AVAILABLE WITH FULL SERVICE HISTORY AND BALANCE OF A SERVICE PLAN & FACTORY WARRANTY! 

COMES WITH THE FOLLOWING EXTRAS:

Comfort/keyless access, comfort/keyless start,
Panoramic roof, sunroof, gearshift paddles, reverse Camera/surround/top area view cameras,  
park distance control (PDC) - front, 
park distance control (PDC) - rear, park assist - front & rear, lane keep assist, Led headlights, 
Daytime driving/running lights, 
Light sensor/automatic light control (auto on-off lights), rain Sensor, cruise control, traction control, Sport/manual/eco/normal driving modes, electro-mechanical parking brake,
Auto-hold, tyre pressure sensor, climate control, 
Bluetooth connectivity, multi-function steering wheel controls, touchscreen radio/USB/iPod/android auto/apple car play, Leather upholstery, electric seats - driver, 
ISOFIX child seat mountings, autodim interior mirror, auto & Electric fold-away mirrors, electric-adjust mirrors, 
Remote central locking, air conditioning, power steering, electric windows, driver airbag, front passenger airbag, anti-Lock braking system (abs), front fog lamps/lights,18'' alloy wheels/rims.

Haval H6 2.0T Luxury 4WD DCT

Torque -  320 Nm @ 1500 rpm
Emissions - 225 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 7 / ALL
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,653 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 61 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km

Contact us for more info....
